verses.roman:
na pradyumno nāniruddho
na rāmo na ca keśavaḥ
yasya śekuḥ paritrātuṁ
ko 'nyas tad-aviteśvaraḥ

synonyms: na—not; pradyumnaḥ—Pradyumna; na—not; aniruddhaḥ—Aniruddha; na—not; rāmaḥ—Balarāma; na—not; ca—also; keśavaḥ—Kṛṣṇa; yasya—whose (infants); śekuḥ—were able; paritrātum—to save; kaḥ—who; anyaḥ—else; tat—in this situation; avitā—as a protector; īśvaraḥ—capable.
translation: "When neither Pradyumna, Aniruddha, Rāma nor Keśava can save a person, who else can possibly protect him?
